# play()

**Instance Method**

Initiates audio playback.

## Declaration

```swift
func play() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when playback is initiated, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] when playback is already in progress or when an error occurred.

## Discussion

This method initiates playback asynchronously and returns control to your application. Therefore, your application can continue doing work while the audio is playing.

## Playing Sounds

- **beep()**: Plays the system beep.
- **isPlaying**: A Boolean that indicates whether the sound is playing its audio data.
- **pause()**: Pauses audio playback.
- **resume()**: Resumes audio playback.
- **stop()**: Concludes audio playback.
